body.name: MARBOO Computer PC Bluetooth Soundbar Speakers Wireless USB Powered Laptop Desktop Monitor Speakers for PC Smartphone Ipad Tablet-Lighting Control-Switch Power On/Off
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 36 mins
features: 【One Cable for Both Audio & Power】: External laptop speakers.No need for a 3.5mm AUX jack, a single USB cable can provide audio and power to USB computer Bluetooth wireless speakers. Greatly helps you avoid messy cables. ✅Note: There is no physical volume control knob on the speaker, you can adjust the speaker volume on your devices.

【Plug and Play】: The MARBOO USB Powered Speaker is a breeze to install and use. Plug it into the computer USB port — click the “Speaker” icon in the taskbar — select “USB Speaker” as your computer playback device. Then, the USB speaker is ready to work for you.✅NOTE: This USB pc speaker has no volume control buttons

【USB External Speakers】:Portable laptop speakers with 3w*2 large dual drive unit and maximum 6W output, monitor speakers deliver impressive sound quality.✅NOTE: This portable mini sound bar has no volume control buttons, you can adjust the speaker volume on your devices.

【Wide Compatibility】: The MARBOO USB Powered Speaker is compatible with any device that has a USB port, including PCs, laptops, tablets, and projectors. You don't need a 3.5mm AUX jack or drivers to use it, making it incredibly convenient.

【Hassle-Free Service】: When you purchase this mini speaker for laptop, you'll receive a quick start guide and our friendly 18-month replacement plus lifetime customer service. This makes your purchase absolutely risk-free and pleasant, so you can buy with confidence.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 7,136 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Seller, Bargain Speaker
reviews.reviewText: Initially the speaker would not work with my desktop using the recommend ports at the back of the system. I attempted using 2.0, 3.0, and 3.1 USB ports. Blue light would come on, but playing sound would result in speaker shutting down. I suspected a driver issue, but nothing would work. I notified the seller, FactoryOutletDeals, and they immediately offered to send a replacement without requiring a return. Within 3 days I had a working unit without the hassle of re-boxing and returning the other device. I am very pleased with the volume range of such a basic speaker bar. While sound can get muddled in the higher volume range or during bass-heavy audio, the mid to low volume quality is just what I needed for those times when I need to charge headphones or show a video to family members. The compact size easily fits under my Gigabyte monitor, sitting on the monitor stand. Overall, I'm happy with the device and the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a reliable speaker for a recent meeting and this device came in clutch. The setup was easy. The sound quality met and exceeded my expectations. I have a mini pc which is a quarter of the size of the speaker just to give an idea of how big the device is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good speaker but it must be hooked up to USB power source at all times
reviews.reviewText: I got a new (to be but used) laptop and the speakers were really weak. I thought this would be a good add-on to give me more volume. Well it came, and I was surprised at how large it was. Plus, it has to be hooked up to a constant power source. I ignorantly thought it was charged and ran on battery power, but that is not the case. It does have a nice sound to it and for the money, it is an excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Cheap and Works🤷‍♂️
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time, plugged it in and it was simple to use, no instructions needed, great size, LED light is a nice little plus, sounds really good considering only cost $10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am well pleased with this speaker. It was for a little laptop with poor sound. This makes a world of difference. I recommend it for any small computer you have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Constant faint staticky hiss
reviews.reviewText: Works okay, but there is always a faint hissing static sound running. I thought maybe it was because I had it plugged into a USB splitter, so I tried plugging it directly into the computer but it still has the hissing sound. A bit annoying to listen to, and can be distracting from the thing I'm supposed to be listening to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At the end of a video submitted by a reviewer he played some music -- sounded great! That and the very low price and a single connection to the computer for power and signal via USB made this a no brainer for me. Got almost exactly what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not amazing, but it works
reviews.reviewText: Now, to be honest, I thought when I ordered this product it had volume controls on the device itself. It did not, but that's my bad, so I won't hold it against the device. That said, I would order something different based on that alone if I needed another.The Good:As a cheep speaker being used for audio monitoring for streaming, it works well enough. It has OK range, good enough sound, and is able to be clear and solid sound at low levels. It can get loud if I need to, and it doesn't distort too badly, and overall the quality of the sound is solid for the price point. Easy USB setup works on USB 2.0 so you can save your 3.0+ ports for something more important, and its stable and solid construction means it will hold up if I used it on the go with a laptop.The Bad:No volume or power buttons on the device itself means you have drive the volume and power from software or just unplugging it. This is expected in the product as described, so I'm not taking points off for this.While the sound is not bad for it's price point, it does have an "in a box" quality to it that gets worse the louder you get, and it's dynamic range is clearly limited. It at least did not distort much at higher volumes.Personal: The Blue LED not only looks kinda cheap, but it's annoying that you can't switch it off, meaning that if you can't have the light somewhere, this may not be the product for you.Overall:I personally would spend more on a better bar or speakers for regular audio use, but as a cheap portable speaker and 2ndary output monitor? This works just fine. I wish it didn't have the RGB, or had a way to turn it off, but for the price I payed, that's a compromise I made, and I felt I've gotten my moneys worth out of this.

reviews.reviewerName: Luis Gerardo Davila SolisLuis Gerardo Davila Solis
reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente producto por el precio ofrecido
reviews.reviewText: Muy buen producto de buena calidad, excelente sonido para el uso que le doy como lo son juntas en Zoom o Teams, precio Justo, si necesitara otra bocina no dudaría en volver a comprarla. Solo 2 detalles los cuales no bajará la calificación que le di, 1. Sería ideal que el volumen también se pueda controlar por medio de la bocina, este solo se controla por medio de la computadora, 2. La luz led de la bocina no se puede apagar aún cuando la PC está apagada, sería excelente opción el tener la forma de apagar la luz aún cuando la bocina no esté en uso.

Great sound quality considering the price it’s valued at. Seems a bit low quality in terms of hardware, like it can easily break if dropped, but sound quality is pretty good. Feels light, looks nice, and you can decide whether or not you want the LED to turn on or off. There’s a volume wheel and power button as well. Only downside is that the cord seems a bit short. All in all, it’s a good bang for your buck if you want something low price but with decent quality

Super Easy to connect with computer, or laptop, great gadget for increasing speaker volume, however, interupts microphone when connected. Disables sound, unable to speak with others or create videos while connected. Seller was great to work with from beginning; understanding and eager to work with in shipping, and resolving concerns for a great customer experience.
最近安く購入したテレビの音があまりにも酷く悩んでいた所、安くて高評価のこの商品を見つけました。電源とLEDのスイッチがそれぞれついてますが自分はLED消してます。肝心のテレビの音ですが、これを着ける前は高音がキンキンしててとても聞けたもんじゃなかったですが、マイルドな音に変わりボリューム上げても普通に聞けるようになりました。満足してます。

reviews.reviewTitle: Could not be easier to install. Sound quality ok.
reviews.reviewText: This type of active speaker is harder and harder to find: it has its own sound card and uses only one USB connection for power and sound. It's always on, and works perfectly for my setup.The sound is good enough enough for video conferencing and to watch an occasional movie, but not to listen to a full concert, don't expect high-fidelity sound.Gripe: I wish there was a way to turn off the light.EDIT: removed one star because I have to unplug and re-plug the USB connector every time I reboot my computer as the speaker is not recognized.
